title: In the House of the Vodouisant
description: (Now available as an audiobook; ask the author for a promotional code to get your free copy today)Three years have past since the horrors of Moorehead Manor almost took the lives of Emily, Adam and Jimmy. Now the legacy of Moorehead is pulling our heroes back into an even deadlier encounter of black magic and betrayal that they may not be able to survive. The finale to the Moorehead Manor series concludes with book 3: To the Dark Room of Souls
author: David McMullen-Sullivan
